text: Juna dina tyasala'i timile dekhnechau, (avastha yo huncha ki) pratyeka dudha khva'une (ama) aphna dudha khane baccaharula'i birsidine chin ra pratyeka garbhavatiko garbhapata bha'ijane cha. Ra timile manisaharula'i nasa lageko avasthama dekhnechau, jabaki tiniharu nasa lageko hune chainan. Tara allahako sajaya bado kathora kuro ho
